snippet: The Republican Governors Association announced on Wednesday that it had set a January record for fund-raising, seeking to refute suggestions that Gov. Chris Christie’s troubles have scared away the group’s donors.
abstract: The Republican Governors Association announced on Wednesday that it had set a January record for fund-raising, seeking to refute suggestions that Gov. Chris Christie’s troubles have scared away the group’s donors.

headline.main: With Christie Under Fire, Republican Governors Have Big Fund-Raising Month
